name: Beverly Building Corporation, Appellant, v. Lower Merion Township Board of Adjustment
name_abbreviation: Beverly Building Corp. v. Lower Merion Township Board of Adjustment

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen and O’Brien, JJ.
parties: Beverly Building Corporation, Appellant, v. Lower Merion Township Board of Adjustment.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The order of the court below is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Honeyman of the Court of Common Pleas of Montgomery County, 28 Pa. D. & C. 2d 761.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Robert L. Trescher, with him 8. Jonathan Emerson, and Montgomery, McCracken, Walker & Rhoads, for appellant.
Lewis II. Yan Dusen, Jr., with him Robert 8. Ryan, and Drinker, Biddle & Reath, for appellees.
Francis F. Shields, with him Albert W. Schiffrin, and Pepper, Hamilton & Scheetz, for intervenor.
casebody.head_matter:
Beverly Building Corporation, Appellant, v. Lower Merion Township Board of Adjustment.
Argued May 2,1962.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen and O’Brien, JJ.
Robert L. Trescher, with him 8. Jonathan Emerson, and Montgomery, McCracken, Walker & Rhoads, for appellant.
January 8, 1963:
Lewis II. Yan Dusen, Jr., with him Robert 8. Ryan, and Drinker, Biddle & Reath, for appellees.
Francis F. Shields, with him Albert W. Schiffrin, and Pepper, Hamilton & Scheetz, for intervenor.
